diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Reactivation of Hepatitis B Virus (HBV) Infection
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient experienced reverse seroconversion, transitioning from HBsAg-negative, HBsAb-positive status indicative of resolved HBV infection to HBsAg-positive status and elevated HBV DNA levels following allogeneic bone marrow transplantation. This was associated with clinical symptoms of transaminitis after the initiation of graft-versus-host disease (GVHD) and tapering of immunosuppressive therapy.
